original_text: And they which went before rebuked him, that he should hold his peace: but he cried so much the more, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
korean_text: 앞서 가는 자들이 그를 꾸짖어 잠잠하라 하되 그가 더욱 크게 소리 질러 다윗의 자손이여 나를 불쌍히 여기소서 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And they which went before rebuked him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 앞에 가던 사람들이 그를 책망하여

sentences.original_text: that he should hold his peace
but he cried so much the more
